long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use to loading the raw image of old newspapers in https://mmis.hkpl.gov.hk/

User can download the raw images directly via this extension, e.g., download the scanned copy of literatures in https://mmis.hkpl.gov.hk/coverpage/-/coverpage/view?p_r_p_-1078056564_c=QF757YsWv5%2FH7zGe%2FKF%2BFHMQMGv9AyDD&_coverpage_WAR_mmisportalportlet_ref=LPEC03
